name: Cinccino
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

abilities.name: Make Do
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
